channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [KAFKA-14804] Connect docs fail to build with Gradle Swagger plugin 2.2.8
item.description:
There is an incompatibility somewhere between versions 2.2.0 and 2.2.8 that cause the following error when building the connect docs:

Caused by: org.gradle.api.GradleException: io.swagger.v3.jaxrs2.integration.SwaggerLoader.setOpenAPI31(java.lang.Boolean)

        at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at org.gradle.internal.reflect.JavaMethod.invoke(JavaMethod.java:125)

        at org.gradle.internal.operations.DefaultBuildOperationExecutor.run(DefaultBuildOperationExecutor.java:68)
        at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.execution.TaskExecution.executeAction(TaskExecution.java:227)
        at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.execution.TaskExecution.executeActions(TaskExecution.java:210)
        at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.execution.TaskExecution.executeWithPreviousOutputFiles(TaskExecution.java:193)

        at io.swagger.v3.plugins.gradle.tasks.ResolveTask.resolve(ResolveTask.java:441)
        ... 117 more

This can be reproduced by setting the plugin version to 2.2.8 and running the "releaseTarGz" Gradle task
item.summary: Connect docs fail to build with Gradle Swagger plugin 2.2.8

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-core/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1#diff-6dd7e9f5703cec610d73a0b72b757860dfd0373a65f9f9120b8ab96dcac5f735 

 

https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-core/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1#diff-57de48456c464b5d8ec53c48ca8fba6d6b09f85385aec86139a121b61c319fee 

 

I'm not sure why there was a breaking change in a patch release but we simply need to bump these two up to 2.2.8 as well to fix the issue.
